document_notes.text:
This update for ghostscript fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-43115: Fixed remote code execution via crafted PostScript documents in gdevijs.c (bsc#1215466).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: In Artifex Ghostscript through 10.01.2, gdevijs.c in GhostPDL can lead to remote code execution via crafted PostScript documents because they can switch to the IJS device, or change the IjsServer parameter, after SAFER has been activated. NOTE: it is a documented risk that the IJS server can be specified on a gs command line (the IJS device inherently must execute a command to start the IJS server).
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

description.text: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
